name: What can we learn from a new generation of designers?
description:
We always say we want more diversity of thinking on our design processes, but how often we actually stop to listen to what a new generation of designers has to say or cares about?

In this talk, Lucas will cover the importance of hiring junior designers, a few things heâ€™s learned about design by working alongside them from diversity to craft, and how can we create a team culture that allows juniors to thrive.
